meanings.definition: Not having the same evolutionary origin or structure.
meanings.sent1: The two species had nonhomologous features, showing they evolved differently.
meanings.sent2: The flowers had nonhomologous petals, indicating they were not related.
meanings.sent3: It was quite amusing to see the nonhomologous shapes of the clouds in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The nonhomologous paths of the two rivers eventually led them in opposite directions.
meanings.sent5: The nonhomologous colors of the birds made them easy to distinguish.

meanings.definition: Not corresponding in structure or evolutionary origin.
meanings.sent1: The nonhomologous proteins in the cells performed different functions.
meanings.sent2: The nonhomologous bones in the skeleton puzzled the archaeologists.
meanings.sent3: The nonhomologous patterns on the socks made them look mismatched.
meanings.sent4: The nonhomologous melodies in the song created a unique harmony.
meanings.sent5: The nonhomologous designs of the buildings stood out in the cityscape.
